R

RedFish - Class in gameobject
The RedFish is a Red Drum
RedFish(int, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class gameobject.RedFish
This Constructor establishes the position, depth, and size of the fish.
registerClick(int, int) - Method in class model.EndModel
 
registerClick(int, int) - Method in class model.EstuaryModel
This checks the position of the mouseclick, to see if an Animal was clicked on, and if so if the selected animal is passes to EstuaryModel.animalCaught(gameobject.Animal).
registerClick(int, int) - Method in class model.Model
This takes a MouseEvent, this is intentionally empty because not every model will have to handle clicks
registerClick(int, int) - Method in class model.QuizModel
 
registerClick(int, int) - Method in class model.ResearchModel
This will select a tool if the start of a user's drag touches it and deselect a tool once the user stops dragging
registerClick(int, int) - Method in class model.TitleModel
 
ResearchModel - Class in model
This model has to handle the positions of the various research tools, and handle various popups
ResearchModel(int, int, Animal, EstuaryModel, CodeListener, boolean) - Constructor for class model.ResearchModel
This calls the super class constructor, sets some popup booleans, sets animalCaught to keep track of which animal was caught and goBack to return to the same state you came from when done researching
researchPopup(Animal) - Method in interface controller.CodeListener
This method will cause a popup to appear showing the data of Animal a.
researchPopup(Animal) - Method in class controller.Controller
 
researchPopup(Animal, CodeListener) - Method in class view.ViewContainer
Draws a ResearchPopup on the container.
ResearchPopup - Class in view
The ResearchPopup represents popups that will appear during the research scene.
ResearchPopup(Animal, CodeListener, int, int) - Constructor for class view.ResearchPopup
Constructor for the ResearchPopup
ResearchView - Class in view
The view for the Research screen
ResearchView(int, int, ArrayList<GameObject>, CodeListener) - Constructor for class view.ResearchView
Construtor for the ResearchView
resetView() - Method in class view.ViewContainer
Clears the pane of everything drawn in it previously to refresh for the next scene.
resetView(JComponent) - Method in class view.ViewContainer
Removes a particular component from the pane to refresh for the next scene.
RESUME - controller.Code
RESUME is a code emitted when the timer should resume due to a popup closing.
RIGHT - controller.Code
RIGHT is a code emitted when the player answers the quiz correctly.
